TextView.android:text:
Step-1: 
Download the app and enter your personal information. Read the instructions. The DiaStrip test should not be taken within one hour after a meal.


Disclaimer: 
DiaStrips evaluate the glucose levels in your saliva based on an enzymatic color change. Elevated levels might indicate diabetes. DiaStrips is not a medical test. If you experience any of the following diabetes signs and symptoms, see your doctor: excessive thirst and increased urination, fatigue, weight loss, blurred vision. 
Link to Mayo Clinic webpage: http://www.mayoclinic.org/diseases-conditions/diabetes/in-depth/diabetes-symptoms/art-20044248 

Step-2: 
Place the DiaStrip in your mouth for 10 seconds.


Step-3: 
Wait 45 seconds for the strip to change color.


Step-4: 
Scan the strip using the DiaStrip App.


Step-5: 
Results: Based on the color of the DiaStrip, your saliva glucose level is assessed. Elevated levels might indicate diabetes and you should contact your doctor to get tested for diabetes. 

Red: Your saliva glucose levels appear to be elevated. Please contact your GP at 415-XXX-XXXX 

Yellow: Inconclusive or slighly elevated levels. 

Green: Your saliva glucose levels appear to be normal. However, if you're experiencing any of the following diabetes signs and symptoms, see your doctor: excessive thirst and increased urination, fatigue, weight loss, blurred vision.
